title: Textile, "Bahamas", 1981
inscribed: Along each side, "BAHAMAS Designed By SUE PALMER For The STUDIO COLLECTION By Warner Copyright (symbol) MCMLXXXI By Warner & Sons Limited (arrow) Top".
dimensions:
Warp: 215.5cm (75in.). Weft: 133.5cm (52 1/2in.) both selvedges present.
Pattern: Two units of design - straight repeat_ across width of cloth.              Height of unit: 71cm (28in.).                                              Width of unit: 63.5cm (25in.).
description: Flowering sprays and floweringntrees against a background of horizontal lines. 3 blues, 4 greens, lavendar, 2 oranges and 2 pinks on white. Width of patter is 127cm (50 in.) leaving a margin at each side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Bahamas", 1981.
1981. Technique: screen printed. Gift of Eddie Squires. 1992-3-21.
